document.full_text: democratic lawmakers warned a pennsylvania nuclear power plant would be at risk of a meltdown in the case of a severe emergency, though top u.s. nuclear officials said the chances of such an event occurring were not likely.
document.title: democrats raise concern about nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: democratic lawmakers warned a pennsylvania nuclear power plant would be at risk of a meltdown in the case of a severe emergency, though top u.s. nuclear officials said the chances of such an event occurring were not likely.
